Dear Mr. Siegel,
I have deeply appreciated your moil kind letter
dated October 23rd, which you tent mm alter our short
meeting of the Italia Prise In Palermo.
I thank you very much indeed for the expression
you use towards our initiative and my personal contribution
to this initiative. 1 can assure you, on the other hand, that
the participation of the NAEB gave the Italia Prise a wider
importance and we are extremely pleased that such an Organ*
isation - and yourself, personally - have joined our interÂ¬
national Competition.
Thank you also on behalf of my staff for your
appreciation. 1 am looking forward to the pleasure of
meeting you soon and I remain, with all best wishes and
regards.
Tours sincerely.
Seme si
Mr. Seymour N. Siegel
Director, MBS
Municipal Building
New York?, N.Y.
